TechFest 2024 - SQL Workshop

Master the Power of Databases!

Event Details

Date of Event

15th November 2024

Coordinators

Student: Vivek Kumar Ray

Teacher: Prof. Jane Doe

About the Event

The SQL Workshop at TechFest 2024 is a hands-on session designed to equip students with practical skills in database management. Participants will learn how to create, manage, and manipulate databases using Structured Query Language (SQL). This workshop is a great opportunity for beginners and intermediate learners to enhance their SQL knowledge and get insights into real-world database applications.

Through this workshop, participants will understand the importance of databases in modern software applications and how SQL can be used to query, update, and manage databases efficiently.

Workshop Guidelines

  • Participants must be current university students.
  • Prior knowledge of SQL is not required but beneficial.
  • Laptops with SQL database software (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) pre-installed are required.
  • Participants must complete exercises and submit queries by the end of the session.
  • Certificates will be provided upon successful completion.
